<!-- Generated by agents-reverse-engineer v1.0.1 -->

# src/core

The `src/core` directory defines the public programmatic API for `agents-reverse-engineer`, re-exporting stable interfaces from AI, discovery, generation, quality, orchestration, change detection, config, and import modules for CLI-independent consumption.

## Contents

- [**index.ts**](./index.ts): Barrel export consolidating core functionality into a single import surface (`agents-reverse-engineer/core`), aliasing `DocumentationOrchestrator` as `GenerationOrchestrator` and `UpdateOrchestrator`.
- [**logger.ts**](./logger.ts): Defines `Logger` interface (`debug`, `warn`, `error` methods), exports `nullLogger` (no-op), `consoleLogger` (writes to `console.error`).

## API Surface

**Import Specifier**: `'agents-reverse-engineer/core'`

**Exported Symbols**:

- **Logger**: `Logger`, `nullLogger`, `consoleLogger`
- **AI**: `AIService`, `AIServiceOptions`, `AIProvider`, `AICallOptions`, `AIResponse`, `AIBackend`, `RetryOptions`, `AIServiceErrorCode`, `AIServiceError`, `withRetry`, `DEFAULT_RETRY_OPTIONS`, `SubprocessProvider`, `SubprocessProviderOptions`
- **Discovery**: `discoverFiles`, `walkDirectory`, `applyFilters`, `FileFilter`, `FilterResult`, `WalkerOptions`
- **Generation Prompts**: `buildFilePrompt`, `buildDirectoryPrompt`, `detectLanguage`, `PromptContext`
- **Generation Writers**: `writeSumFile`, `readSumFile`, `getSumPath`, `sumFileExists`, `getAnnexPath`, `writeAnnexFile`, `SumFileContent`, `writeAgentsMd`, `writeAgentsMdHub`, `isGeneratedAgentsMd`, `writeClaudeMdPointer`
- **Generation Orchestration**: `DocumentationOrchestrator` (aliased as `GenerationOrchestrator`, `UpdateOrchestrator`), `GenerationPlan`, `PreparedFile`, `AnalysisTask`, `UpdatePlan`, `buildExecutionPlan`, `formatExecutionPlanAsMarkdown`, `ExecutionPlan`, `ExecutionTask`
- **Quality**: `extractExports`, `checkCodeVsDoc`, `checkCodeVsCode`, `checkPhantomPaths`, `buildInconsistencyReport`, `formatReportForCli`, `formatReportAsMarkdown`, `Inconsistency`, `InconsistencyReport`, `InconsistencySeverity`, `CodeDocInconsistency`, `CodeCodeInconsistency`, `PhantomPathInconsistency`
- **Orchestration**: `runPool`, `PoolOptions`, `TaskResult`
- **Change Detection**: `computeContentHash`, `computeContentHashFromString`, `isGitRepo`, `getCurrentCommit`, `getChangedFiles`, `FileChange`, `ChangeDetectionResult`
- **Config**: `loadConfig`, `findProjectRoot`, `ConfigSchema`, `Config`, `getDefaultConcurrency`, `DEFAULT_EXCLUDE_PATTERNS`, `DEFAULT_VENDOR_DIRS`
- **Imports**: `extractImports`, `extractDirectoryImports`, `formatImportMap`

**Maturity**: API marked `@beta` until v1.0.0, subject to breaking changes.

## File Relationships

`index.ts` imports from `../ai/index.js`, `../discovery/index.js`, `../generation/prompts/index.js`, `../generation/writers/index.js`, `../generation/index.js`, `../quality/index.js`, `../orchestration/index.js`, `../change-detection/index.js`, `../config/index.js`, `../imports/index.js`, `./logger.js`, consolidating stable exports into a single entry point. `logger.ts` stands alone, consumed by modules requiring injectable logging (`AI`, `Discovery`, `Generation`).

## Workflow & Conventions

Programmatic consumers import `'agents-reverse-engineer/core'` instead of CLI commands. `Logger` injection decouples core library from console output, enabling silent operation (`nullLogger`) or custom logging. Use `consoleLogger` to preserve CLI-style stderr output. API stability governed by semver after v1.0.0.
